Steps to reproduce:

My Regional Settings are configure for English(India) with Short Date Format Set to dd-MMM-yyyy. This results in a Short Month name being displayed as part of the date. 


Actual results:

Whenever I create a new contact, the Birthday field displays "-Oct-" for reason. (Please see attachment)
Whenever I try to open a contact record with already defined Birthday.. the DD and MM part are separated by "-Oct-", creating a confusion. (Please see attachment)


Expected results:

The Contact record should have followed the System Configuration and displayed 21-Feb instead of 21-Oct-02 as displayed in the attachment.
